word:
Chap. 211 - To C. P. Bollman

November 20, 1902 -B- 
                                                            B-179-1902 


                       "Elmshaven," Sanitarium, Cal., 


                                               November 19, 1902. 

Dear Brother Bollman,--- 


     I have a deep interest in you. I recognize the fact that you have capabilities which, if sanctified, would enable you to be a laborer together with God. But at the present time you are not this kind of a laborer.
